main event: A round, baseball-sized, yellow-white object was observed in the sky over Detroit, Michigan on August 27, 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed while the witness was walking in their yard.
Weather balloons were reported in the local area at the time of the sighting.
The object was observed for an unknown duration.
The sighting was classified as probably a weather balloon.
The report mentions that weather balloons were launched from either Selfridge Air Force Base or Willow Run.
